```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import statsmodels.api as sm
```
```{python}
temp_carb = pd.read_csv("temperature_CarbonIntensity.csv")
temp_carb["z_intensity"] = (temp_carb["carbon_intensity_estimate"] - temp_carb["carbon_intensity_estimate"].mean()) / temp_carb["carbon_intensity_estimate"].std()

temp_carb.head()
```
```{python} 
X = sm.add_constant(temp_carb["carbon_intensity_estimate"])
y = temp_carb["temperature_2m"]

model =  sm.OLS(y, X).fit()
model.summary()
```
